item.title: John Wayne's Final John Ford Movie Was A Major Departure From Their Previous 13 Films Together
item.description: John Wayne and John Ford formed one of the greatest actor-director partnerships in cinema history, but their last movie together was a curious one.

item.title: Fans Of The Blacklist Should Watch James Spader Playing An Informant In This Seminal 1987 Crime Movie
item.description: James Spader's informant Raymond Reddington in The Blacklist may be his career-defining role, but he also played a similar role three decades earlier.

item.title: The Extraction Mission & Delta Force Teamwork In Ridley Scott's $173M War Movie Is "100% Legit," Expert Is Basically Nitpicking For Errors
item.description: A former U.S. Army special forces operator rates Ridley Scott's 2001 war drama for accuracy, praising its realistic depiction of a real operation.
